fields.description: Specifies in decimal number, the version the OS disk should be reimaged to. If exact version is not provided, the OS disk is reimaged to the existing version of OS Disk.
fields.name: ExactVersion

fields.description: Parameter to force update ephemeral OS disk for a virtual machine scale set VM
fields.name: ForceUpdateOSDiskForEphemeral

fields.description: The virtual machine scale set instance ids. Omitting the virtual machine scale set instance ids will result in the operation being performed on all virtual machines in the virtual machine scale set.
fields.name: InstanceIds

fields.description: Specifies information required for reimaging the non-ephemeral OS disk.
fields.name: OsProfile

fields.description: Specifies whether to reimage temp disk. Default value: false. Note: This temp disk reimage parameter is only supported for VM/VMSS with Ephemeral OS disk.
fields.name: TempDisk
